title: 'The Black Hole' was Disney's original response to 'Star Wars'. What the hell were they thinking?
description: Trapped somewhere between the big ideas of "2001" and the fun of a galaxy far, far away, this 1979 movie is a true space oddity.
content: Trapped somewhere between the big ideas of "2001" and the fun of a galaxy far, far away, this 1979 movie is a true space oddity.
